TopicTitle: Pico - Light Jet Trainer and a dream to fly!

Articles.Content:
The Pico. Looks a bit bland. Not exactly out there. But you're not flying this for looks. This thing is perhaps the funnest little grocery go-getter I've ever built. I don't know why it makes me so happy to toodle around in it... It's a training aircraft, has things like drogue chutes and an airbrake - just like bigger planes do. Flies like a dream.

[Get yours here](https://www.dropbox.com/s/xjctndyhkcgi4y4/PV-PR1%20%27Pico%27.craft?dl=0)

Here's a list of somethings it can do: 

Short Take-off. 

Loops straight from take off. 

Mach 1 13G Turns. 

Knife edges. 

Flying. 

Landing. 

Crashing. 

Endos. 

VTOL landings.

Sustained 5.5G turns
